price: 31. Verily, We sent against them a single Saihah (torment - awful cry), and they became like the stubble of a fold-builder.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَكَانُواْ كَهَشِيمِ ٱلۡمُحۡتَظِرِ
